Run Tğ‘‡T steps with Tğ‘‡T determined in (62),

âˆ¥ğ°tâˆ’Î·â€‹gâ€‹(ğ°t)âˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥â‰¤2Î”2â€‹(M+Î”)â€‹(Fâ€‹(ğ°0)âˆ’Fâ€‹(ğ°âˆ—)).delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°ğ‘¡ğœ‚ğ‘”subscriptğ°ğ‘¡superscriptğ°2superscriptÎ”2ğ‘€Î”ğ¹subscriptğ°0ğ¹superscriptğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{t}-\eta g(\mathbf{w}_{t})-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert\leq\frac{2}{\Delta^{2}}(M+\Delta)(F(\mathbf{w}_{0})-F(\mathbf{w}^{*})). (89)

Hence we can study the algorithm without projection. From (76),

Fâ€‹(ğ°t+1)â‰¤Fâ€‹(ğ°0)âˆ’12â€‹Lâ€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°t)âˆ¥+12â€‹Lâ€‹Î”2.ğ¹subscriptğ°ğ‘¡1ğ¹subscriptğ°012ğ¿delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğ°ğ‘¡12ğ¿superscriptÎ”2\displaystyle F(\mathbf{w}_{t+1})\leq F(\mathbf{w}_{0})-\frac{1}{2L}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{w}_{t})\right\rVert+\frac{1}{2L}\Delta^{2}. (90)

Sum up over tğ‘¡t,

Fâ€‹(ğ°tm)â‰¤Fâ€‹(ğ°0)âˆ’12â€‹Lâ€‹âˆ‘t=0tmâˆ’1âˆ¥âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°t)âˆ¥2+12â€‹Lâ€‹Î”2.ğ¹subscriptğ°subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘šğ¹subscriptğ°012ğ¿superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘š1superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğ°ğ‘¡212ğ¿superscriptÎ”2\displaystyle F(\mathbf{w}_{t_{m}})\leq F(\mathbf{w}_{0})-\frac{1}{2L}\sum_{t=0}^{t_{m}-1}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{w}_{t})\right\rVert^{2}+\frac{1}{2L}\Delta^{2}. (91)

Hence

âˆ‘t=0tmâˆ’1âˆ¥âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°t)âˆ¥2â‰¤2â€‹Lâ€‹(Fâ€‹(ğ°0)âˆ’Fâ€‹(ğ°âˆ—))+Î”2â‰¤2â€‹Î”2,superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘š1superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğ°ğ‘¡22ğ¿ğ¹subscriptğ°0ğ¹superscriptğ°superscriptÎ”22superscriptÎ”2\displaystyle\sum_{t=0}^{t_{m}-1}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{w}_{t})\right\rVert^{2}\leq 2L(F(\mathbf{w}_{0})-F(\mathbf{w}^{*}))+\Delta^{2}\leq 2\Delta^{2}, (92)

and

mint=0,1,â€¦,tmâ€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°t)âˆ¥â‰¤2â€‹Î”.ğ‘¡01â€¦subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘šdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğ°ğ‘¡2Î”\displaystyle\underset{t=0,1,\ldots,t_{m}}{\min}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{w}_{t})\right\rVert\leq\sqrt{2}\Delta. (93)

The proof of Lemma 3 is complete.

Appendix B Proof of Theorem 1

Define

r0=maxâ¡{8â€‹Ïƒ2nâ€‹lnâ¡2Ã—6dâ€‹mâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dÎ´,4â€‹Ïƒnâ€‹lnâ¡2Ã—6dâ€‹mâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dÎ´}+2N,subscriptğ‘Ÿ08superscriptğœ2ğ‘›2superscript6ğ‘‘ğ‘šsubscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘ğ›¿4ğœğ‘›2superscript6ğ‘‘ğ‘šsubscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘ğ›¿2ğ‘\displaystyle r_{0}=\max\left\{\sqrt{\frac{8\sigma^{2}}{n}\ln\frac{2\times 6^{d}mC_{W}(NL)^{d}}{\delta}},\frac{4\sigma}{n}\ln\frac{2\times 6^{d}mC_{W}(NL)^{d}}{\delta}\right\}+\frac{2}{N}, (94)

and

Î”0=maxâ¡{8â€‹Ïƒ2Nâ€‹lnâ¡2Ã—6dâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dÎ´,4â€‹ÏƒNâ€‹lnâ¡2Ã—6dâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dÎ´}+2N.subscriptÎ”08superscriptğœ2ğ‘2superscript6ğ‘‘subscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘ğ›¿4ğœğ‘2superscript6ğ‘‘subscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘ğ›¿2ğ‘\displaystyle\Delta_{0}=\max\left\{\sqrt{\frac{8\sigma^{2}}{N}\ln\frac{2\times 6^{d}C_{W}(NL)^{d}}{\delta}},\frac{4\sigma}{N}\ln\frac{2\times 6^{d}C_{W}(NL)^{d}}{\delta}\right\}+\frac{2}{N}. (95)

We provide a finite sample statement of Theorem 1 as following.

Theorem 1.

If Tâ‰¥4â€‹r0ğ‘‡4subscriptğ‘Ÿ0T\geq 4r_{0}, then under Assumption 2 and 3, the following equations hold with probability at least 1âˆ’Î´1ğ›¿1-\delta.

(1) (Strong convex Fğ¹F) Under Assumption 1(a), with Î·â‰¤1/Lğœ‚1ğ¿\eta\leq 1/L,

âˆ¥ğ°tâˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥â‰¤(1âˆ’Ï)tâ€‹âˆ¥ğ°0âˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥+2â€‹Î”AÎ¼,delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°ğ‘¡superscriptğ°superscript1ğœŒğ‘¡delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°0superscriptğ°2subscriptÎ”ğ´ğœ‡\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{t}-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert\leq(1-\rho)^{t}\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{0}-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert+\frac{2\Delta_{A}}{\mu}, (96)

in which Ï=Î·â€‹Î¼/2ğœŒğœ‚ğœ‡2\rho=\eta\mu/2;

(2) (General convex Fğ¹F) Under Assumption 1(b), with Î·=1/Lğœ‚1ğ¿\eta=1/L, after tm=(L/Î”A)â€‹âˆ¥ğ°0âˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥2subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘šğ¿subscriptÎ”ğ´subscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°0superscriptğ°2t_{m}=(L/\Delta_{A})\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{0}-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert_{2} steps,

Fâ€‹(ğ°tm)âˆ’Fâ€‹(ğ°âˆ—)â‰¤16â€‹âˆ¥ğ°0âˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥â€‹Î”A;ğ¹subscriptğ°subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘šğ¹superscriptğ°16delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°0superscriptğ°subscriptÎ”ğ´\displaystyle F(\mathbf{w}_{t_{m}})-F(\mathbf{w}^{*})\leq 16\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{0}-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert\Delta_{A}; (97)

(3) (Non-convex Fğ¹F) Under Assumption 1(c), with Î·=1/Lğœ‚1ğ¿\eta=1/L, after tm=(2â€‹L/Î”A2)â€‹(Fâ€‹(ğ°0)âˆ’Fâ€‹(ğ°âˆ—))subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘š2ğ¿superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ´2ğ¹subscriptğ°0ğ¹superscriptğ°t_{m}=(2L/\Delta_{A}^{2})(F(\mathbf{w}_{0})-F(\mathbf{w}^{*})) steps, we have

mint=0,1,â€¦,tmâ€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°t)âˆ¥â‰¤2â€‹Î”A,ğ‘¡01â€¦subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘šdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğ°ğ‘¡2subscriptÎ”ğ´\displaystyle\underset{t=0,1,\ldots,t_{m}}{\min}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{w}_{t})\right\rVert\leq\sqrt{2}\Delta_{A}, (98)

in which

Î”A={3â€‹Ïµâ€‹T+Î”0ifÏµâ‰¤141âˆ’Ïµ1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµâ€‹r0+Tif14<Ïµ<12.subscriptÎ”ğ´cases3italic-Ïµğ‘‡subscriptÎ”0ifitalic-Ïµ141italic-Ïµ12italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘‡if14italic-Ïµ12\displaystyle\Delta_{A}=\left\{\begin{array}[]{ccc}3\epsilon T+\Delta_{0}&\text{if}&\epsilon\leq\frac{1}{4}\\ \frac{1-\epsilon}{\sqrt{1-2\epsilon}}r_{0}+T&\text{if}&\frac{1}{4}<\epsilon<\frac{1}{2}.\end{array}\right. (100)

We would like to remark that with Tâˆ¼Ïƒâ€‹(d/n)â€‹lnâ¡(N/Î´)similar-toğ‘‡ğœğ‘‘ğ‘›ğ‘ğ›¿T\sim\sigma\sqrt{(d/n)\ln(N/\delta)}, we have the following asymptotic bound

Î”Aâ‰²(11âˆ’2â€‹Ïµâ€‹Ïµn+1N)â€‹dâ€‹lnâ¡NÎ´.less-than-or-similar-tosubscriptÎ”ğ´112italic-Ïµitalic-Ïµğ‘›1ğ‘ğ‘‘ğ‘ğ›¿\displaystyle\Delta_{A}\lesssim\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-2\epsilon}}\frac{\epsilon}{\sqrt{n}}+\frac{1}{\sqrt{N}}\right)\sqrt{d\ln\frac{N}{\delta}}. (101)

Now we prove this theorem. Recall that ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w}) and ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}) are defined in (54) and (55).

Lemma 4.

With probability at least 1âˆ’Î´1ğ›¿1-\delta, the following inequalities hold: (1) For all iâˆˆ[m]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘ši\in[m] and ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤r0;delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq r_{0}; (102)

(2) For all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥1mâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Î”0.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptÎ”0\displaystyle\left\lVert\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^{m}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\Delta_{0}. (103)
Proof.

The proof is shown in Section B.1. âˆ

Define

aâ€‹(ğ°)=argâ¡minğ‘ â€‹âˆ‘i=1mÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥).ğ‘ğ°ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šitalic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle a(\mathbf{w})=\underset{s}{\arg\min}\sum_{i=1}^{m}\phi(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert). (104)

Then the following lemmas hold.

Lemma 5.

If (102) holds uniformly for all iğ‘–i and ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W}, then for all i=1,â€¦,mğ‘–1â€¦ğ‘ši=1,\ldots,m,

âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤2â€‹r0.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq 2r_{0}. (105)
Proof.

The proof is shown in Section B.2. âˆ

Lemma 6.

Under the condition that (102) and (103) hold uniformly for all iğ‘–i and ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W}, if

Tâ‰¥21âˆ’2â€‹Ïµâ€‹r0,ğ‘‡212italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle T\geq\frac{2}{1-2\epsilon}r_{0}, (106)

then for all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Ïµâ€‹(T+2â€‹r0)1âˆ’Ïµ,delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°italic-Ïµğ‘‡2subscriptğ‘Ÿ01italic-Ïµ\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\frac{\epsilon(T+2r_{0})}{1-\epsilon}, (107)

in which r0subscriptğ‘Ÿ0r_{0} is defined in (94).

Proof.

The proof is shown in Section B.3. âˆ

Lemma 7.

Under the same conditions as Lemma 6, for all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Î”0,delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptÎ”0\displaystyle\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\Delta_{0}, (108)

in which Î”0subscriptÎ”0\Delta_{0} is defined in (95).

Proof.

The proof is shown in Section B.4. âˆ

Lemma 8.

Under the condition that (102) and (103) hold uniformly for all iğ‘–i and ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤maxâ¡{1âˆ’Ïµ1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµâ€‹r0,T+r0}.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°1italic-Ïµ12italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\max\left\{\frac{1-\epsilon}{\sqrt{1-2\epsilon}}r_{0},T+r_{0}\right\}. (109)
Proof.

The proof is shown in Section B.5. âˆ

Now we combine the results of Lemma 6, 7 and 8. With Tâ‰¥4â€‹r0ğ‘‡4subscriptğ‘Ÿ0T\geq 4r_{0}, if Ïµâ‰¤1/4italic-Ïµ14\epsilon\leq 1/4, then from Lemma 6 and 7,

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Ïµâ€‹(T+2â€‹r0)1âˆ’Ïµ+Î”0â‰¤2â€‹Ïµâ€‹(T+2â€‹r0)+Î”0â‰¤3â€‹Ïµâ€‹T+Î”0.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°italic-Ïµğ‘‡2subscriptğ‘Ÿ01italic-ÏµsubscriptÎ”02italic-Ïµğ‘‡2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0subscriptÎ”03italic-Ïµğ‘‡subscriptÎ”0\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\frac{\epsilon(T+2r_{0})}{1-\epsilon}+\Delta_{0}\leq 2\epsilon(T+2r_{0})+\Delta_{0}\leq 3\epsilon T+\Delta_{0}. (110)

If Ïµ>1/4italic-Ïµ14\epsilon>1/4, then from Lemma 8,

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤1âˆ’Ïµ1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµâ€‹r0+T.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°1italic-Ïµ12italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘‡\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\frac{1-\epsilon}{\sqrt{1-2\epsilon}}r_{0}+T. (111)

Define

Î”A={3â€‹Ïµâ€‹T+Î”0ifÏµâ‰¤141âˆ’Ïµ1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµâ€‹r0+Tif14<Ïµ<12.subscriptÎ”ğ´cases3italic-Ïµğ‘‡subscriptÎ”0ifitalic-Ïµ141italic-Ïµ12italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘‡if14italic-Ïµ12\displaystyle\Delta_{A}=\left\{\begin{array}[]{ccc}3\epsilon T+\Delta_{0}&\text{if}&\epsilon\leq\frac{1}{4}\\ \frac{1-\epsilon}{\sqrt{1-2\epsilon}}r_{0}+T&\text{if}&\frac{1}{4}<\epsilon<\frac{1}{2}.\end{array}\right. (113)

Then

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Î”A.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptÎ”ğ´\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\Delta_{A}. (114)

Theorem 2 can then be proved using Lemma 1, 2 and 3 with Î”=Î”AÎ”subscriptÎ”ğ´\Delta=\Delta_{A}.

B.1 Proof of Lemma 4

Here we show that both (1) and (2) in Lemma 4 are satisfied with probability at least 1âˆ’Î´/21ğ›¿21-\delta/2.

Define l=1/(Nâ€‹L)ğ‘™1ğ‘ğ¿l=1/(NL). With N>1/(rDâ€‹L),l<rDformulae-sequenceğ‘1subscriptğ‘Ÿğ·ğ¿ğ‘™subscriptğ‘Ÿğ·N>1/(r_{D}L),l<r_{D} holds, in which rDsubscriptğ‘Ÿğ·r_{D} is the constant in Assumption 2. Let ğ°ksuperscriptğ°ğ‘˜\mathbf{w}^{k}, k=1,â€¦,Ncâ€‹(l)ğ‘˜1â€¦subscriptğ‘ğ‘ğ‘™k=1,\ldots,N_{c}(l) be a lğ‘™l-covering of the parameter space ğ’²ğ’²\mathcal{W}. Then according to Assumption 2, the covering number is bounded by

Ncâ€‹(l)â‰¤CWld=CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)d.subscriptğ‘ğ‘ğ‘™subscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘™ğ‘‘subscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘\displaystyle N_{c}(l)\leq\frac{C_{W}}{l^{d}}=C_{W}(NL)^{d}. (115)

Firstly, we prove the sub-exponential concentration of ğ†isubscriptğ†ğ‘–\mathbf{G}_{i}. For all vector ğ¯ğ¯\mathbf{v} with âˆ¥ğ¯âˆ¥=1delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¯1\left\lVert\mathbf{v}\right\rVert=1, we have

ğ”¼â€‹[eÎ»â€‹ğ¯Tâ€‹(ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°))]ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptğ‘’ğœ†superscriptğ¯ğ‘‡subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[e^{\lambda\mathbf{v}^{T}(\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))}\right] =\displaystyle= ğ”¼â€‹[expâ¡[1nâ€‹Î»â€‹ğ¯Tâ€‹âˆ‘j=1n(âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ°,ğ™iâ€‹j)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°))]]ğ”¼delimited-[]1ğ‘›ğœ†superscriptğ¯ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘›âˆ‡ğ‘“ğ°subscriptğ™ğ‘–ğ‘—âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\exp\left[\frac{1}{n}\lambda\mathbf{v}^{T}\sum_{j=1}^{n}(\nabla f(\mathbf{w},\mathbf{Z}_{ij})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))\right]\right] (116)
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq (e12â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Î»2n2)nâ€‹Â ifÂ â€‹|Î»|â‰¤nÏƒsuperscriptsuperscriptğ‘’12superscriptğœ2superscriptğœ†2superscriptğ‘›2ğ‘›Â ifÂ ğœ†ğ‘›ğœ\displaystyle\left(e^{\frac{1}{2}\sigma^{2}\frac{\lambda^{2}}{n^{2}}}\right)^{n}\text{ if }|\lambda|\leq\frac{n}{\sigma}
=\displaystyle= e12â€‹nâ€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Î»2â€‹Â ifÂ â€‹|Î»|â‰¤nÏƒ.superscriptğ‘’12ğ‘›superscriptğœ2superscriptğœ†2Â ifÂ ğœ†ğ‘›ğœ\displaystyle e^{\frac{1}{2n}\sigma^{2}\lambda^{2}}\text{ if }|\lambda|\leq\frac{n}{\sigma}.

Hence

Pâ€‹(ğ¯Tâ€‹(Giâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°))>u)Psuperscriptğ¯ğ‘‡subscriptğºğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘¢\displaystyle\text{P}(\mathbf{v}^{T}(G_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))>u) â‰¤\displaystyle\leq infÎ»â‰¥0â€‹eâˆ’Î»â€‹uâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[eÎ»â€‹ğ¯Tâ€‹(Giâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°))]ğœ†0infimumsuperscriptğ‘’ğœ†ğ‘¢ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptğ‘’ğœ†superscriptğ¯ğ‘‡subscriptğºğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\displaystyle\underset{\lambda\geq 0}{\inf}e^{-\lambda u}\mathbb{E}\left[e^{\lambda\mathbf{v}^{T}(G_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))}\right] (117)
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq inf0â‰¤Î»â‰¤n/Ïƒâ€‹eâˆ’Î»â€‹uâ€‹e12â€‹nâ€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Î»20ğœ†ğ‘›ğœinfimumsuperscriptğ‘’ğœ†ğ‘¢superscriptğ‘’12ğ‘›superscriptğœ2superscriptğœ†2\displaystyle\underset{0\leq\lambda\leq n/\sigma}{\inf}e^{-\lambda u}e^{\frac{1}{2n}\sigma^{2}\lambda^{2}}
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq eâˆ’n2â€‹minâ¡{u2Ïƒ2,uÏƒ}.superscriptğ‘’ğ‘›2superscriptğ‘¢2superscriptğœ2ğ‘¢ğœ\displaystyle e^{-\frac{n}{2}\min\left\{\frac{u^{2}}{\sigma^{2}},\frac{u}{\sigma}\right\}}.

Let ğ’±={v1,â€¦,vN0}ğ’±subscriptğ‘£1â€¦subscriptğ‘£subscriptğ‘0\mathcal{V}=\{v_{1},\ldots,v_{N_{0}}\} be a 1/2121/2-covering of unit sphere. From Lemma 5.2 and 5.3 in [33], we have N0â‰¤6dsubscriptğ‘0superscript6ğ‘‘N_{0}\leq 6^{d}, and

âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤2â€‹supğ¯âˆˆğ’±â€‹ğ¯Tâ€‹(ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)).delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°2ğ¯ğ’±supremumsuperscriptğ¯ğ‘‡subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq 2\underset{\mathbf{v}\in\mathcal{V}}{\sup}\mathbf{v}^{T}(\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})). (118)

Such argument was also used in [8]. Hence

Pâ€‹(âˆ¥Giâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥>u)Pdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğºğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘¢\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\left\lVert G_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert>u\right) â‰¤\displaystyle\leq Pâ€‹(âˆªğ¯âˆˆğ’±{ğ¯Tâ€‹(ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°))>u2})Psubscriptğ¯ğ’±superscriptğ¯ğ‘‡subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘¢2\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\cup_{\mathbf{v}\in\mathcal{V}}\left\{\mathbf{v}^{T}(\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))>\frac{u}{2}\right\}\right) (119)
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq 6dâ€‹eâˆ’n2â€‹minâ¡{u24â€‹Ïƒ2,u2â€‹Ïƒ}.superscript6ğ‘‘superscriptğ‘’ğ‘›2superscriptğ‘¢24superscriptğœ2ğ‘¢2ğœ\displaystyle 6^{d}e^{-\frac{n}{2}\min\left\{\frac{u^{2}}{4\sigma^{2}},\frac{u}{2\sigma}\right\}}.

Take union, we get

Pâ€‹(âˆƒiâˆˆ[m],âˆƒkâˆˆ[Ncâ€‹(l)],âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥>u)â‰¤mâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dâ€‹6dâ€‹eâˆ’n2â€‹minâ¡{u24â€‹Ïƒ2,u2â€‹Ïƒ}.Pformulae-sequenceğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šformulae-sequenceğ‘˜delimited-[]subscriptğ‘ğ‘ğ‘™delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ°ğ‘˜ğ‘¢ğ‘šsubscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘superscript6ğ‘‘superscriptğ‘’ğ‘›2superscriptğ‘¢24superscriptğœ2ğ‘¢2ğœ\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\exists i\in[m],\exists k\in[N_{c}(l)],\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert>u\right)\leq mC_{W}(NL)^{d}6^{d}e^{-\frac{n}{2}\min\left\{\frac{u^{2}}{4\sigma^{2}},\frac{u}{2\sigma}\right\}}. (120)

Recall the definition of r0subscriptğ‘Ÿ0r_{0} in (94). Then

Pâ€‹(âˆƒiâˆˆ[m],âˆƒkâˆˆ[Ncâ€‹(l)],âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥>r0âˆ’2N)â‰¤Î´2.Pformulae-sequenceğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šformulae-sequenceğ‘˜delimited-[]subscriptğ‘ğ‘ğ‘™delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ°ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘Ÿ02ğ‘ğ›¿2\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\exists i\in[m],\exists k\in[N_{c}(l)],\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert>r_{0}-\frac{2}{N}\right)\leq\frac{\delta}{2}. (121)

To generalize above bound from ğ°ksuperscriptğ°ğ‘˜\mathbf{w}^{k} to arbitrary ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W}, note that

âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert (122)
=\displaystyle= minğ‘˜â€‹[âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥+âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥+âˆ¥âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥]ğ‘˜delimited-[]delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ°ğ‘˜delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ°ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\displaystyle\underset{k}{\min}\left[\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert+\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert+\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\right]
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq minğ‘˜â€‹[âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥+âˆ¥âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥]+maxğ‘˜â€‹âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥ğ‘˜delimited-[]delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ°ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘˜delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ°ğ‘˜\displaystyle\underset{k}{\min}\left[\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert+\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\right]+\underset{k}{\max}\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq 2â€‹Lâ€‹l+maxğ‘˜â€‹âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥2ğ¿ğ‘™ğ‘˜delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ°ğ‘˜\displaystyle 2Ll+\underset{k}{\max}\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert
=\displaystyle= 2N+maxğ‘˜â€‹âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥.2ğ‘ğ‘˜delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ°ğ‘˜\displaystyle\frac{2}{N}+\underset{k}{\max}\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert.

Hence

Pâ€‹(âˆƒiâˆˆ[m],âˆƒğ°âˆˆğ’²,âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥>r0)â‰¤Î´2.Pformulae-sequenceğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šformulae-sequenceğ°ğ’²delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ°ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ›¿2\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\exists i\in[m],\exists\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert>r_{0}\right)\leq\frac{\delta}{2}. (123)

Now we bound the probability of violating (2) in Lemma 4. Similar to (119), we have

Pâ€‹(âˆ¥1mâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥>u)â‰¤6dâ€‹eâˆ’N2â€‹minâ¡{u24â€‹Ïƒ2,u2â€‹Ïƒ}.Pdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘¢superscript6ğ‘‘superscriptğ‘’ğ‘2superscriptğ‘¢24superscriptğœ2ğ‘¢2ğœ\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\left\lVert\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^{m}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert>u\right)\leq 6^{d}e^{-\frac{N}{2}\min\left\{\frac{u^{2}}{4\sigma^{2}},\frac{u}{2\sigma}\right\}}. (124)

Recall the definition of Î”0subscriptÎ”0\Delta_{0} in (95). Then

Pâ€‹(âˆƒkâˆˆ[Ncâ€‹(l)],âˆ¥1mâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mğ†iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥>Î”0âˆ’2N)â‰¤Î´2.Pformulae-sequenceğ‘˜delimited-[]subscriptğ‘ğ‘ğ‘™delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ†ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ°ğ‘˜subscriptÎ”02ğ‘ğ›¿2\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\exists k\in[N_{c}(l)],\left\lVert\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^{m}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert>\Delta_{0}-\frac{2}{N}\right)\leq\frac{\delta}{2}. (125)

Therefore, with probability at least 1âˆ’Î´1ğ›¿1-\delta, (102) and (103) are both satisfied for all iâˆˆ[m]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘ši\in[m] and kâˆˆ[Ncâ€‹(l)]ğ‘˜delimited-[]subscriptğ‘ğ‘ğ‘™k\in[N_{c}(l)]. The corresponding bound for all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W} is

Pâ€‹(âˆƒğ°âˆˆğ’²,âˆ¥1mâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mğ†iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥>Î”0)â‰¤Î´2.Pformulae-sequenceğ°ğ’²delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ†ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ°ğ‘˜subscriptÎ”0ğ›¿2\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\exists\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},\left\lVert\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^{m}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert>\Delta_{0}\right)\leq\frac{\delta}{2}. (126)

With (123) and (126), the proof is finished.

B.2 Proof of Lemma 5

From (104), aâ€‹(ğ°)ğ‘ğ°a(\mathbf{w}) is within the convex hull of ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}), i=1,â€¦,mğ‘–1â€¦ğ‘ši=1,\ldots,m. Therefore

âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert â‰¤\displaystyle\leq maxiâ€²âˆˆ[m]â€‹âˆ¥ğ†iâ€²â€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥superscriptğ‘–â€²delimited-[]ğ‘šdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†superscriptğ‘–â€²ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\underset{i^{\prime}\in[m]}{\max}\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i^{\prime}}(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert (127)
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq maxiâ€²âˆˆ[m]â€‹(âˆ¥ğ†iâ€²â€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥+âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)superscriptğ‘–â€²delimited-[]ğ‘šdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†superscriptğ‘–â€²ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\displaystyle\underset{i^{\prime}\in[m]}{\max}\left(\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i^{\prime}}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert+\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\right)
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq 2â€‹r0.2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle 2r_{0}.

B.3 Proof of Lemma 6

From (104), we have

âˆ‘i=1mâˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)=ğŸ.superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°0\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m}\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)=\mathbf{0}. (128)

Define

hâ€‹(ğ¬,ğ°)=âˆ‘i=1mÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥).â„ğ¬ğ°superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šitalic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle h(\mathbf{s},\mathbf{w})=\sum_{i=1}^{m}\phi(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert). (129)

To prove Lemma 6, we calculate the gradient of hâ„h at gâ€‹(ğ°)ğ‘”ğ°g(\mathbf{w}) and aâ€‹(ğ°)ğ‘ğ°a(\mathbf{w}), respectively, and then bound âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert using the Hessian of hâ„h. Recall that the aggregator function gâ€‹(ğ°)ğ‘”ğ°g(\mathbf{w}) is defined in (51), i.e.

gâ€‹(ğ°)=argâ¡minğ‘ â€‹hâ€‹(ğ¬,ğ°),ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ â„ğ¬ğ°\displaystyle g(\mathbf{w})=\underset{s}{\arg\min}h(\mathbf{s},\mathbf{w}), (130)

hence

âˆ‡shâ€‹(gâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)=ğŸ.subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘”ğ°ğ°0\displaystyle\nabla_{s}h(g(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})=\mathbf{0}. (131)

Now we bound the gradient of hâ„h at aâ€‹(ğ°)ğ‘ğ°a(\mathbf{w}).

âˆ¥âˆ‡shâ€‹(aâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘ğ°ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\nabla_{s}h(a(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})\right\rVert =\displaystyle= âˆ¥âˆ‘i=1mâˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\sum_{i=1}^{m}\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)\right\rVert (132)
=(a)ğ‘\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{=} âˆ¥âˆ‘i=1m(âˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)âˆ’âˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥))âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\sum_{i=1}^{m}\left(\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)-\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)\right)\right\rVert
=(b)ğ‘\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{=} âˆ¥âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬(âˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)âˆ’âˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥))âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}\left(\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)-\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)\right)\right\rVert
â‰¤(c)ğ‘\displaystyle\overset{(c)}{\leq} |â„¬|â€‹(T+2â€‹r0)â„¬ğ‘‡2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle|\mathcal{B}|(T+2r_{0})
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq Ïµâ€‹mâ€‹(T+2â€‹r0).italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘‡2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle\epsilon m(T+2r_{0}).

(a) comes from (128). (b) holds since (54) indicates that ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)=ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})=\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}) for all iâˆ‰â„¬ğ‘–â„¬i\notin\mathcal{B}. Now we show (c). Note that

âˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥sâˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)={ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)ifâˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤TTâ€‹ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥ifâˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥>T.subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°casesğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°ifdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°ğ‘‡ğ‘‡ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°ifdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°ğ‘‡\displaystyle\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert s-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)=\left\{\begin{array}[]{ccc}\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})&\text{if}&\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq T\\ T\frac{\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})}{\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert}&\text{if}&\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert>T.\end{array}\right. (135)

Therefore âˆ¥âˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥sâˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)âˆ¥â‰¤Tdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°ğ‘‡\left\lVert\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert s-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)\right\rVert\leq T always holds. Similarly,

âˆ¥âˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)\right\rVert â‰¤\displaystyle\leq Tâ€‹âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥ğ‘‡delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle T\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert (136)
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq 2â€‹Tâ€‹r0,2ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle 2Tr_{0},

in which the last step comes from Lemma 5. Therefore, (c) in (135) holds.

To bound âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert, it remains to bound the Hessian of hâ„h. By calculating derivative of (135), âˆ‡s2Ï•â€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)=ğˆsuperscriptsubscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ 2italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°ğˆ\nabla_{s}^{2}\phi(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)=\mathbf{I} if âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Tdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°ğ‘‡\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq T; if âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥>Tdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°ğ‘‡\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert>T, then âˆ‡s2Ï•â€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)âª°ğŸsucceeds-or-equalssuperscriptsubscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ 2italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°0\nabla_{s}^{2}\phi(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)\succeq\mathbf{0}. Define

rs=Tâˆ’2â€‹r0.subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ ğ‘‡2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle r_{s}=T-2r_{0}. (137)

Then for all ğ¬âˆˆBâ€‹(aâ€‹(ğ°,rs))ğ¬ğµğ‘ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ \mathbf{s}\in B(a(\mathbf{w},r_{s})), we have

âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğšâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥+âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬ğšğ°delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°ğ‘ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{a}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert+\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert (138)
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq rs+2â€‹r0subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ 2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle r_{s}+2r_{0}
=\displaystyle= T,ğ‘‡\displaystyle T,

in which the second inequality comes from Lemma 5. Hence

âˆ‡s2hâ€‹(ğ¬,ğ°)superscriptsubscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ 2â„ğ¬ğ°\displaystyle\nabla_{s}^{2}h(\mathbf{s},\mathbf{w}) =\displaystyle= âˆ‘i=1mâˆ‡s2Ï•â€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ 2italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m}\nabla_{s}^{2}\phi(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert) (139)
âª°succeeds-or-equals\displaystyle\succeq âˆ‘iâˆ‰â„¬ğŸâ€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤T)â€‹ğˆsubscriptğ‘–â„¬1delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°ğ‘‡ğˆ\displaystyle\sum_{i\notin\mathcal{B}}\mathbf{1}(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq T)\mathbf{I}
=\displaystyle= âˆ‘iâˆ‰â„¬ğŸâ€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤T)â€‹ğˆsubscriptğ‘–â„¬1delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°ğ‘‡ğˆ\displaystyle\sum_{i\notin\mathcal{B}}\mathbf{1}(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq T)\mathbf{I}
âª°succeeds-or-equals\displaystyle\succeq (1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹mâ€‹ğˆ.1italic-Ïµğ‘šğˆ\displaystyle(1-\epsilon)m\mathbf{I}.

Therefore

âˆ¥âˆ‡shâ€‹(aâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡shâ€‹(gâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¥minâ¡{âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥,rs}â€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹m.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘ğ°ğ°subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘”ğ°ğ°delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ 1italic-Ïµğ‘š\displaystyle\left\lVert\nabla_{s}h(a(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})-\nabla_{s}h(g(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\geq\min\{\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert,r_{s}\}(1-\epsilon)m. (140)

From (131) and (132),

âˆ¥âˆ‡shâ€‹(aâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡shâ€‹(gâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Ïµâ€‹mâ€‹(T+2â€‹r0).delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘ğ°ğ°subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘”ğ°ğ°italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘‡2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle\left\lVert\nabla_{s}h(a(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})-\nabla_{s}h(g(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\epsilon m(T+2r_{0}). (141)

Therefore, from (140) and (141),

minâ¡{âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥,rs}â‰¤Ïµâ€‹(T+2â€‹r0)1âˆ’Ïµ.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ italic-Ïµğ‘‡2subscriptğ‘Ÿ01italic-Ïµ\displaystyle\min\{\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert,r_{s}\}\leq\frac{\epsilon(T+2r_{0})}{1-\epsilon}. (142)

From (106) and (137), it can be shown that rs=Tâˆ’2â€‹r0â‰¥Ïµâ€‹(T+2â€‹r0)/(1âˆ’Ïµ)subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ ğ‘‡2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0italic-Ïµğ‘‡2subscriptğ‘Ÿ01italic-Ïµr_{s}=T-2r_{0}\geq\epsilon(T+2r_{0})/(1-\epsilon). Therefore, (142) becomes

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Ïµâ€‹(T+2â€‹r0)1âˆ’Ïµ.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°italic-Ïµğ‘‡2subscriptğ‘Ÿ01italic-Ïµ\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\frac{\epsilon(T+2r_{0})}{1-\epsilon}. (143)

The proof of Lemma 6 is complete.

B.4 Proof of Lemma 7

Recall that the condition of Lemma 7 is the same as Lemma 6, which requires that Tâ‰¥2â€‹r0/(1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµ)ğ‘‡2subscriptğ‘Ÿ012italic-ÏµT\geq 2r_{0}/(1-2\epsilon). Therefore, for all iâˆˆ[m]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘ši\in[m], from Lemma 5,

âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤2â€‹r0<T.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘‡\displaystyle\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq 2r_{0}<T. (144)

Hence

aâ€‹(ğ°)ğ‘ğ°\displaystyle a(\mathbf{w}) =\displaystyle= argâ¡minğ‘ â€‹âˆ‘i=1mÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šitalic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\underset{s}{\arg\min}\sum_{i=1}^{m}\phi(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert) (145)
=\displaystyle= argâ¡minğ‘ â€‹âˆ‘i=1m12â€‹âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥2ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘š12superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°2\displaystyle\underset{s}{\arg\min}\sum_{i=1}^{m}\frac{1}{2}\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert^{2}
=\displaystyle= 1mâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mğ†iâ€‹(ğ°).1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^{m}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}).

From (103),

âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Î”0.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptÎ”0\displaystyle\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\Delta_{0}. (146)

B.5 Proof of Lemma 8

Define hâ€‹(ğ¬,ğ°)â„ğ¬ğ°h(\mathbf{s},\mathbf{w}) as in (129). Then

âˆ‡shâ€‹(gâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)=ğŸ.subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘”ğ°ğ°0\displaystyle\nabla_{s}h(g(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})=\mathbf{0}. (147)

Define a unit vector points to the direction of âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘”ğ°\nabla F(\mathbf{w})-g(\mathbf{w}):

ğ®=âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥.ğ®âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘”ğ°delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘”ğ°\displaystyle\mathbf{u}=\frac{\nabla F(\mathbf{w})-g(\mathbf{w})}{\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{w})-g(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert}. (148)

Then

ğ®Tâ€‹âˆ‡shâ€‹(gâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)=0.superscriptğ®ğ‘‡subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘”ğ°ğ°0\displaystyle\mathbf{u}^{T}\nabla_{s}h(g(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})=0. (149)

Denote r=âˆ¥âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥ğ‘Ÿdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘”ğ°r=\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{w})-g(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert. If r>T+r0ğ‘Ÿğ‘‡subscriptğ‘Ÿ0r>T+r_{0}, then for all iâˆˆ[m]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘ši\in[m],

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¥âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥âˆ’âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¥râˆ’r0>T.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘Ÿsubscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘‡\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\geq\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert-\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\geq r-r_{0}>T. (150)

Hence

ğ®Tâ€‹âˆ‡shâ€‹(gâ€‹(ğ°,ğ°))superscriptğ®ğ‘‡subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘”ğ°ğ°\displaystyle\mathbf{u}^{T}\nabla_{s}h(g(\mathbf{w},\mathbf{w})) =\displaystyle= âˆ‘i=1mğ®Tâ€‹âˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptğ®ğ‘‡subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m}\mathbf{u}^{T}\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert) (151)
=\displaystyle= âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ–â„¬ğ®Tâ€‹âˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)+âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬ğ®Tâ€‹âˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šâ„¬superscriptğ®ğ‘‡subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğ‘–â„¬superscriptğ®ğ‘‡subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\sum_{i\in[m]\setminus\mathcal{B}}\mathbf{u}^{T}\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)+\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}\mathbf{u}^{T}\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)
â‰¥(a)ğ‘\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\geq} âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ–â„¬ğ®Tâ€‹âˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)âˆ’Ïµâ€‹mâ€‹Tsubscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šâ„¬superscriptğ®ğ‘‡subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘‡\displaystyle\sum_{i\in[m]\setminus\mathcal{B}}\mathbf{u}^{T}\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)-\epsilon mT
=(b)ğ‘\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{=} Tâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ–â„¬ğ®Tâ€‹gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥âˆ’Ïµâ€‹mâ€‹Tğ‘‡subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šâ„¬superscriptğ®ğ‘‡ğ‘”ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘‡\displaystyle T\sum_{i\in[m]\setminus\mathcal{B}}\mathbf{u}^{T}\frac{g(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})}{\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert}-\epsilon mT
â‰¥(c)ğ‘\displaystyle\overset{(c)}{\geq} Tâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ–â„¬1âˆ’r02r2âˆ’Ïµâ€‹mâ€‹Tğ‘‡subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šâ„¬1superscriptsubscriptğ‘Ÿ02superscriptğ‘Ÿ2italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘‡\displaystyle T\sum_{i\in[m]\setminus\mathcal{B}}\sqrt{1-\frac{r_{0}^{2}}{r^{2}}}-\epsilon mT
=\displaystyle= [(1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹1âˆ’r02r2âˆ’Ïµ]â€‹mâ€‹T.delimited-[]1italic-Ïµ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘Ÿ02superscriptğ‘Ÿ2italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘‡\displaystyle\left[(1-\epsilon)\sqrt{1-\frac{r_{0}^{2}}{r^{2}}}-\epsilon\right]mT.

For (a), note that âˆ¥âˆ‡sÏ•â€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)âˆ¥â‰¤Tdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ italic-Ï•delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°ğ‘‡\left\lVert\nabla_{s}\phi(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)\right\rVert\leq T always hold. (b) uses the gradient of Ï•italic-Ï•\phi in (135). From (150), âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¥Tdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°ğ‘‡\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\geq T. For (c), consider the triangle whose vertices are âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°),gâ€‹(ğ°),ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘”ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\nabla F(\mathbf{w}),g(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}), and edges lengths are âˆ¥âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥=rdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘Ÿ\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{w})-g(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert=r, âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤r0delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿ0\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq r_{0}, the cosine of the angle corresponding to vertex gâ€‹(ğ°)ğ‘”ğ°g(\mathbf{w}) is at least 1âˆ’r02/r21superscriptsubscriptğ‘Ÿ02superscriptğ‘Ÿ2\sqrt{1-r_{0}^{2}/r^{2}}.

From (149) and (151),

(1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹1âˆ’r02r2âˆ’Ïµâ‰¤0,1italic-Ïµ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘Ÿ02superscriptğ‘Ÿ2italic-Ïµ0\displaystyle(1-\epsilon)\sqrt{1-\frac{r_{0}^{2}}{r^{2}}}-\epsilon\leq 0, (152)

which yields

râ‰¤r0â€‹1âˆ’Ïµ1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµ.ğ‘Ÿsubscriptğ‘Ÿ01italic-Ïµ12italic-Ïµ\displaystyle r\leq r_{0}\frac{1-\epsilon}{\sqrt{1-2\epsilon}}. (153)

Recall that (153) is derived under the condition r>T+r0ğ‘Ÿğ‘‡subscriptğ‘Ÿ0r>T+r_{0}. Therefore, the following bound holds in general:

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤maxâ¡{1âˆ’Ïµ1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµâ€‹r0,T+r0}.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°1italic-Ïµ12italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘Ÿ0\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\max\left\{\frac{1-\epsilon}{\sqrt{1-2\epsilon}}r_{0},T+r_{0}\right\}. (154)

Appendix C Proof of Theorem 2

Let

R=8â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹lnâ¡2dâ€‹mâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dÎ´,ğ‘…8superscriptğœ2superscript2ğ‘‘ğ‘šsubscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘ğ›¿\displaystyle R=\sqrt{8\sigma^{2}\ln\frac{2^{d}mC_{W}(NL)^{d}}{\delta}}, (155)

The complete statement of Theorem 2 is shown as following.

Theorem 2.

Let

Ti=T0+Mni,subscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡0ğ‘€subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–\displaystyle T_{i}=T_{0}+\frac{M}{\sqrt{n_{i}}}, (156)

with Mâ‰¥2â€‹Rğ‘€2ğ‘…M\geq 2R, and

T0â‰¥Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµâ€‹mN,subscriptğ‘‡0italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…12italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘\displaystyle T_{0}\geq\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-2\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}, (157)

Then under Assumption 2 and 3, the following equations hold with probability 1âˆ’Î´1ğ›¿1-\delta.

(1) (Strong convex Fğ¹F) Under Assumption 1(a), with Î·â‰¤1/Lğœ‚1ğ¿\eta\leq 1/L,

âˆ¥ğ°tâˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥â‰¤(1âˆ’Ï)tâ€‹âˆ¥ğ°0âˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥+2â€‹Î”AÎ¼,delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°ğ‘¡superscriptğ°superscript1ğœŒğ‘¡delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°0superscriptğ°2subscriptÎ”ğ´ğœ‡\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{t}-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert\leq(1-\rho)^{t}\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{0}-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert+\frac{2\Delta_{A}}{\mu}, (158)

in which Ï=Î·â€‹Î¼/2ğœŒğœ‚ğœ‡2\rho=\eta\mu/2;

(2) (General convex Fğ¹F) Under Assumption 1(b), with Î·=1/Lğœ‚1ğ¿\eta=1/L, after tm=(L/Î”B)â€‹âˆ¥ğ°0âˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥2subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘šğ¿subscriptÎ”ğµsubscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°0superscriptğ°2t_{m}=(L/\Delta_{B})\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{0}-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert_{2} steps,

Fâ€‹(ğ°tm)âˆ’Fâ€‹(ğ°âˆ—)â‰¤16â€‹âˆ¥ğ°0âˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥â€‹Î”B;ğ¹subscriptğ°subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘šğ¹superscriptğ°16delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°0superscriptğ°subscriptÎ”ğµ\displaystyle F(\mathbf{w}_{t_{m}})-F(\mathbf{w}^{*})\leq 16\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{0}-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert\Delta_{B}; (159)

(3) (Non-convex Fğ¹F) Under Assumption 1(c), with Î·=1/Lğœ‚1ğ¿\eta=1/L, after tm=(2â€‹L/Î”B2)â€‹(Fâ€‹(ğ°0)âˆ’Fâ€‹(ğ°âˆ—))subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘š2ğ¿superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğµ2ğ¹subscriptğ°0ğ¹superscriptğ°t_{m}=(2L/\Delta_{B}^{2})(F(\mathbf{w}_{0})-F(\mathbf{w}^{*})) steps, we have

mint=0,1,â€¦,tmâ€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°t)âˆ¥â‰¤2â€‹Î”B,ğ‘¡01â€¦subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘šdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğ°ğ‘¡2subscriptÎ”ğµ\displaystyle\underset{t=0,1,\ldots,t_{m}}{\min}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{w}_{t})\right\rVert\leq\sqrt{2}\Delta_{B}, (160)

in which

Î”B=Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹T0+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹mN+Î”0.subscriptÎ”ğµitalic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡0italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…1italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘subscriptÎ”0\displaystyle\Delta_{B}=\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}T_{0}+\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}+\Delta_{0}. (161)

Now we prove Theorem 2. Define

ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)=1niâ€‹âˆ‘j=1niâˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ°,ğ™iâ€‹j)subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°1subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–âˆ‡ğ‘“ğ°subscriptğ™ğ‘–ğ‘—\displaystyle\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})=\frac{1}{n_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{n_{i}}\nabla f(\mathbf{w},\mathbf{Z}_{ij}) (162)

If nisubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–n_{i} are the same for all iğ‘–i, then (162) reduces to

ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)=1nâ€‹âˆ‘j=1nâˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ°,ğ™iâ€‹j).subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1ğ‘›âˆ‡ğ‘“ğ°subscriptğ™ğ‘–ğ‘—\displaystyle\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j=1}^{n}\nabla f(\mathbf{w},\mathbf{Z}_{ij}). (163)

Define

r0â€‹i=maxâ¡{8â€‹Ïƒ2niâ€‹lnâ¡2Ã—6dâ€‹mâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dÎ´,4â€‹Ïƒniâ€‹lnâ¡2Ã—6dâ€‹mâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dÎ´}+2N.subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–8superscriptğœ2subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2superscript6ğ‘‘ğ‘šsubscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘ğ›¿4ğœsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2superscript6ğ‘‘ğ‘šsubscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘ğ›¿2ğ‘\displaystyle r_{0i}=\max\left\{\sqrt{\frac{8\sigma^{2}}{n_{i}}\ln\frac{2\times 6^{d}mC_{W}(NL)^{d}}{\delta}},\frac{4\sigma}{n_{i}}\ln\frac{2\times 6^{d}mC_{W}(NL)^{d}}{\delta}\right\}+\frac{2}{N}. (164)

Then the following lemma holds.

Lemma 9.

With probability at least 1âˆ’Î´1ğ›¿1-\delta, the following inequalities hold: (1) for all iâˆˆ[m]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘ši\in[m] and ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤r0â€‹i;delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq r_{0i}; (165)

(2) For all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Î”0,delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptÎ”0\displaystyle\left\lVert\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\Delta_{0}, (166)

in which Î”0subscriptÎ”0\Delta_{0} is defined in (95).

The proof of Lemma 9 just follows the proof of Lemma 4. We omit the detailed steps here.

Similar to (104) for balanced case, define

aâ€‹(ğ°)=argâ¡minğ‘ â€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹Ï•iâ€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥).ğ‘ğ°ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptitalic-Ï•ğ‘–delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle a(\mathbf{w})=\underset{s}{\arg\min}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\phi_{i}(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert). (167)

Then the following lemmas hold.

Lemma 10.

Under the condition that (165) and (166) hold uniformly for all iğ‘–i and ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W}, if Ti=T0+M/nisubscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡0ğ‘€subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–T_{i}=T_{0}+M/\sqrt{n_{i}}, with Mâ‰¥2â€‹Rğ‘€2ğ‘…M\geq 2R, and

T0â‰¥Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµâ€‹mN,subscriptğ‘‡0italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…12italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘\displaystyle T_{0}\geq\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-2\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}, (168)

then for all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹T0+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹mN.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡0italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…1italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}T_{0}+\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}. (169)
Proof.

The proof is shown in Section C.1. âˆ

Lemma 11.

Under the same conditions as Lemma 10, for all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Î”0.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptÎ”0\displaystyle\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\Delta_{0}. (170)

The proof of Lemma 11 just follows the proof of Lemma 7 in Section B.4. We omit the detailed steps.

Combine Lemma 10 and 11, for all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹T0+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹mN+Î”0:=Î”B.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡0italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…1italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘subscriptÎ”0assignsubscriptÎ”ğµ\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}T_{0}+\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}+\Delta_{0}:=\Delta_{B}. (171)

Theorem 2 can then be proved using Lemma 1, 2 and 3 with Î”=Î”BÎ”subscriptÎ”ğµ\Delta=\Delta_{B}.

C.1 Proof of Lemma 10

Recall that

gâ€‹(ğ°)=argâ¡minğ‘ â€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹Ï•iâ€‹(âˆ¥sâˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥).ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptitalic-Ï•ğ‘–delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle g(\mathbf{w})=\underset{s}{\arg\min}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\phi_{i}(\left\lVert s-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert). (172)

Define

hâ€‹(ğ¬,ğ°)=âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹Ï•iâ€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥).â„ğ¬ğ°superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptitalic-Ï•ğ‘–delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle h(\mathbf{s},\mathbf{w})=\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\phi_{i}(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert). (173)

Then

gâ€‹(ğ°)=argâ¡minğ‘ â€‹hâ€‹(ğ¬,ğ°),ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ â„ğ¬ğ°\displaystyle g(\mathbf{w})=\underset{s}{\arg\min}h(\mathbf{s},\mathbf{w}), (174)

and

âˆ‡shâ€‹(gâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)=ğŸ,subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘”ğ°ğ°0\displaystyle\nabla_{s}h(g(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})=\mathbf{0}, (175)

and similar to the derivation of (132), we get

âˆ¥âˆ‡shâ€‹(aâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘ğ°ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\nabla_{s}h(a(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})\right\rVert =\displaystyle= âˆ¥âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹âˆ‡sÏ•iâ€‹(âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ subscriptitalic-Ï•ğ‘–delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\nabla_{s}\phi_{i}(\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)\right\rVert (176)
=\displaystyle= âˆ¥âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹(âˆ‡sÏ•iâ€‹(âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)âˆ’âˆ‡sÏ•iâ€‹(âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥))âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ subscriptitalic-Ï•ğ‘–delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ subscriptitalic-Ï•ğ‘–delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\left(\nabla_{s}\phi_{i}(\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)-\nabla_{s}\phi_{i}(\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)\right)\right\rVert
=\displaystyle= âˆ¥âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ€‹(âˆ‡sÏ•iâ€‹(âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥)âˆ’âˆ‡sÏ•iâ€‹(âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥))âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ subscriptitalic-Ï•ğ‘–delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ subscriptitalic-Ï•ğ‘–delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}n_{i}\left(\nabla_{s}\phi_{i}(\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)-\nabla_{s}\phi_{i}(\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert)\right)\right\rVert
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ€‹(Ti+2â€‹r0â€‹i).subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–\displaystyle\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}n_{i}(T_{i}+2r_{0i}).

Now bound the Hessian âˆ‡s2hâ€‹(ğ¬,ğ°)superscriptsubscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ 2â„ğ¬ğ°\nabla_{s}^{2}h(\mathbf{s},\mathbf{w}):

âˆ‡s2hâ€‹(ğ¬,ğ°)âª°âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹ğŸâ€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Ti)â€‹ğˆ.succeeds-or-equalssuperscriptsubscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ 2â„ğ¬ğ°superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–1delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–ğˆ\displaystyle\nabla_{s}^{2}h(\mathbf{s},\mathbf{w})\succeq\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mathbf{1}(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq T_{i})\mathbf{I}. (177)

For sâˆˆBâ€‹(aâ€‹(ğ°),T0)ğ‘ ğµğ‘ğ°subscriptğ‘‡0s\in B(a(\mathbf{w}),T_{0}) and iâˆ‰â„¬ğ‘–â„¬i\notin\mathcal{B}, ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)=ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})=\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}), hence

âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥+âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤T0+2â€‹r0â€‹i.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬ğ‘ğ°delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğ‘‡02subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert+\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq T_{0}+2r_{0i}. (178)

Let

n0=2â€‹Ïƒâ€‹lnâ¡2Ã—6dâ€‹mâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dÎ´.subscriptğ‘›02ğœ2superscript6ğ‘‘ğ‘šsubscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘ğ›¿\displaystyle n_{0}=2\sigma\ln\frac{2\times 6^{d}mC_{W}(NL)^{d}}{\delta}. (179)

For all iğ‘–i with niâ‰¥n0subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ‘›0n_{i}\geq n_{0}, we have r0â€‹i=R/nisubscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–ğ‘…subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–r_{0i}=R/\sqrt{n_{i}}. Then

âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤T0+2â€‹Rniâ‰¤T0+Mni=T.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğ‘‡02ğ‘…subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡0ğ‘€subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–ğ‘‡\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq T_{0}+\frac{2R}{\sqrt{n_{i}}}\leq T_{0}+\frac{M}{\sqrt{n_{i}}}=T. (180)

Therefore, for all sâˆˆBâ€‹(aâ€‹(ğ°),T0)ğ‘ ğµğ‘ğ°subscriptğ‘‡0s\in B(a(\mathbf{w}),T_{0}),

âˆ‡s2hâ€‹(ğ¬,ğ°)superscriptsubscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ 2â„ğ¬ğ°\displaystyle\nabla_{s}^{2}h(\mathbf{s},\mathbf{w}) âª°succeeds-or-equals\displaystyle\succeq âˆ‘iâˆ‰â„¬niâ€‹ğŸâ€‹(âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Ti)subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–1delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–\displaystyle\sum_{i\notin\mathcal{B}}n_{i}\mathbf{1}(\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq T_{i}) (181)
=\displaystyle= âˆ‘iâˆ‰â„¬niâ€‹ğˆsubscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–ğˆ\displaystyle\sum_{i\notin\mathcal{B}}n_{i}\mathbf{I}
âª°succeeds-or-equals\displaystyle\succeq Nâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹ğˆ.ğ‘1italic-Ïµğˆ\displaystyle N(1-\epsilon)\mathbf{I}.

From (175), (176) and (181), we have

minâ¡{âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥,T0}â‰¤âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ€‹(Ti+2â€‹r0â€‹i)Nâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ).delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ‘‡0subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–ğ‘1italic-Ïµ\displaystyle\min\{\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert,T_{0}\}\leq\frac{\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}n_{i}(T_{i}+2r_{0i})}{N(1-\epsilon)}. (182)

Note that

âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ€‹(Ti+2â€‹r0â€‹i)subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–\displaystyle\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}n_{i}(T_{i}+2r_{0i}) â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ€‹(T0+Mni+2â€‹Rni)subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡0ğ‘€subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2ğ‘…subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–\displaystyle\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}n_{i}\left(T_{0}+\frac{M}{\sqrt{n_{i}}}+\frac{2R}{\sqrt{n_{i}}}\right) (183)
â‰¤(a)ğ‘\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\leq} Ïµâ€‹Nâ€‹T0+(M+2â€‹R)â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niitalic-Ïµğ‘subscriptğ‘‡0ğ‘€2ğ‘…subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–\displaystyle\epsilon NT_{0}+(M+2R)\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}\sqrt{n_{i}}
â‰¤(b)ğ‘\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{\leq} Ïµâ€‹Nâ€‹T0+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)â€‹mâ€‹N.italic-Ïµğ‘subscriptğ‘‡0italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…ğ‘šğ‘\displaystyle\epsilon NT_{0}+\epsilon(M+2R)\sqrt{mN}.

For (a), recall that Ïµitalic-Ïµ\epsilon is already defined in (17), which ensures that âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ‰¤Ïµâ€‹Nsubscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–italic-Ïµğ‘\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}n_{i}\leq\epsilon N. For (b), according to (17), |â„¬|â‰¤Ïµâ€‹mâ„¬italic-Ïµğ‘š|\mathcal{B}|\leq\epsilon m, thus from Cauchy inequality,

âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ‰¤|â„¬|â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ‰¤Ïµâ€‹mâ‹…Ïµâ€‹N=Ïµâ€‹mâ€‹N.subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–â‹…italic-Ïµğ‘šitalic-Ïµğ‘italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘\displaystyle\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}\sqrt{n_{i}}\leq\sqrt{|\mathcal{B}|\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}n_{i}}\leq\sqrt{\epsilon m\cdot\epsilon N}=\epsilon\sqrt{mN}. (184)

Therefore,

âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ€‹(Ti+2â€‹r0â€‹i)Nâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ)subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–ğ‘1italic-Ïµ\displaystyle\frac{\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}n_{i}(T_{i}+2r_{0i})}{N(1-\epsilon)} â‰¤\displaystyle\leq Ïµâ€‹Nâ€‹T0+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)â€‹mâ€‹NNâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ)italic-Ïµğ‘subscriptğ‘‡0italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…ğ‘šğ‘ğ‘1italic-Ïµ\displaystyle\frac{\epsilon NT_{0}+\epsilon(M+2R)\sqrt{mN}}{N(1-\epsilon)} (185)
=\displaystyle= Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹T0+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹mNitalic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡0italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…1italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘\displaystyle\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}T_{0}+\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}
â‰¤(a)ğ‘\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\leq} Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹T0+1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹T0italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡012italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡0\displaystyle\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}T_{0}+\frac{1-2\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}T_{0}
=\displaystyle= T0,subscriptğ‘‡0\displaystyle T_{0},

in which (a) comes from (168). From (182) and (185),

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ€‹(Ti+2â€‹r0â€‹i)Nâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ)â‰¤Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹T0+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹mN.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–ğ‘1italic-Ïµitalic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡0italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…1italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\frac{\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}n_{i}(T_{i}+2r_{0i})}{N(1-\epsilon)}\leq\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}T_{0}+\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}. (186)

Appendix D Proof of Theorem 3

Recall that

rÎ¼=4â€‹ÏƒÎ¼â€‹lnâ¡2Ã—6dâ€‹mâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dÎ´+2N,subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡4subscriptğœğœ‡2superscript6ğ‘‘ğ‘šsubscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘ğ›¿2ğ‘\displaystyle r_{\mu}=4\sigma_{\mu}\ln\frac{2\times 6^{d}mC_{W}(NL)^{d}}{\delta}+\frac{2}{N}, (187)

and

Î”Î¼=maxâ¡{8â€‹ÏƒÎ¼2â€‹âˆ‘i=1mni2N2â€‹lnâ¡2Ã—6dâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dÎ´,4â€‹ÏƒÎ¼â€‹nmaxNâ€‹lnâ¡2Ã—6dâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dÎ´}+2N.subscriptÎ”ğœ‡8superscriptsubscriptğœğœ‡2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2superscriptğ‘22superscript6ğ‘‘subscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘ğ›¿4subscriptğœğœ‡subscriptğ‘›ğ‘2superscript6ğ‘‘subscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘ğ›¿2ğ‘\displaystyle\Delta_{\mu}=\max\left\{\sqrt{\frac{8\sigma_{\mu}^{2}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}^{2}}{N^{2}}\ln\frac{2\times 6^{d}C_{W}(NL)^{d}}{\delta}},\frac{4\sigma_{\mu}n_{\max}}{N}\ln\frac{2\times 6^{d}C_{W}(NL)^{d}}{\delta}\right\}+\frac{2}{N}. (188)

The non-asymptotic statement of Theorem 3 is shown as follows.

Theorem 3.

Let

Ti=T0+Mni,subscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡0ğ‘€subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–\displaystyle T_{i}=T_{0}+\frac{M}{\sqrt{n_{i}}}, (189)

with Mâ‰¥2â€‹Rğ‘€2ğ‘…M\geq 2R, and

T0â‰¥2â€‹rÎ¼1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµ+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµâ€‹mN.subscriptğ‘‡02subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡12italic-Ïµitalic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…12italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘\displaystyle T_{0}\geq\frac{2r_{\mu}}{1-2\epsilon}+\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-2\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}. (190)

Under Assumption 2 and Assumption 4, the following equations holds with probability at least 1âˆ’2â€‹Î´12ğ›¿1-2\delta. (1) (Strong convex Fğ¹F) Under Assumption 1(a), with Î·â‰¤1/Lğœ‚1ğ¿\eta\leq 1/L,

âˆ¥ğ°tâˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥â‰¤(1âˆ’Ï)tâ€‹âˆ¥ğ°0âˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥+2â€‹Î”CÎ¼,delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°ğ‘¡superscriptğ°superscript1ğœŒğ‘¡delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°0superscriptğ°2subscriptÎ”ğ¶ğœ‡\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{t}-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert\leq(1-\rho)^{t}\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{0}-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert+\frac{2\Delta_{C}}{\mu}, (191)

in which Ï=Î·â€‹Î¼/2ğœŒğœ‚ğœ‡2\rho=\eta\mu/2;

(2) (General convex Fğ¹F) Under Assumption 1(b), with Î·=1/Lğœ‚1ğ¿\eta=1/L, after tm=(L/Î”C)â€‹âˆ¥ğ°0âˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥2subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘šğ¿subscriptÎ”ğ¶subscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°0superscriptğ°2t_{m}=(L/\Delta_{C})\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{0}-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert_{2} steps,

Fâ€‹(ğ°tm)âˆ’Fâ€‹(ğ°âˆ—)â‰¤16â€‹âˆ¥ğ°0âˆ’ğ°âˆ—âˆ¥â€‹Î”C;ğ¹subscriptğ°subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘šğ¹superscriptğ°16delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ°0superscriptğ°subscriptÎ”ğ¶\displaystyle F(\mathbf{w}_{t_{m}})-F(\mathbf{w}^{*})\leq 16\left\lVert\mathbf{w}_{0}-\mathbf{w}^{*}\right\rVert\Delta_{C}; (192)

(3) (Non-convex Fğ¹F) Under Assumption 1(c), with Î·=1/Lğœ‚1ğ¿\eta=1/L, after tm=(2â€‹L/Î”C2)â€‹(Fâ€‹(ğ°0)âˆ’Fâ€‹(ğ°âˆ—))subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘š2ğ¿superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ¶2ğ¹subscriptğ°0ğ¹superscriptğ°t_{m}=(2L/\Delta_{C}^{2})(F(\mathbf{w}_{0})-F(\mathbf{w}^{*})) steps, we have

mint=0,1,â€¦,tmâ€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°t)âˆ¥â‰¤2â€‹Î”C,ğ‘¡01â€¦subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘šdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğ°ğ‘¡2subscriptÎ”ğ¶\displaystyle\underset{t=0,1,\ldots,t_{m}}{\min}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{w}_{t})\right\rVert\leq\sqrt{2}\Delta_{C}, (193)

in which

Î”CsubscriptÎ”ğ¶\displaystyle\Delta_{C} =\displaystyle= Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹(T0+2â€‹rÎ¼)+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹mN+Î”0+Î”Î¼.italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡02subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…1italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘subscriptÎ”0subscriptÎ”ğœ‡\displaystyle\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}(T_{0}+2r_{\mu})+\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}+\Delta_{0}+\Delta_{\mu}. (194)

Similar to Lemma 4 and 9, we show the following lemmas for non i.i.d case.

Lemma 12.

With probability at least 1âˆ’2â€‹Î´12ğ›¿1-2\delta, the following inequalities hold:

(1) For all iâˆˆ[m]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘ši\in[m] and ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤r0â€‹i;delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq r_{0i}; (195)

(2) For all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Î”0;delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°subscriptÎ”0\displaystyle\left\lVert\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\Delta_{0}; (196)

(3) For all iâˆˆ[m]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘ši\in[m] and ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤rÎ¼,delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡\displaystyle\left\lVert\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq r_{\mu}, (197)

in which rÎ¼subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡r_{\mu} is defined in (187);

(4) For all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Î”Î¼,delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptÎ”ğœ‡\displaystyle\left\lVert\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\Delta_{\mu}, (198)

in which Î”Î¼subscriptÎ”ğœ‡\Delta_{\mu} is defined in (188).

Proof.

The proof is shown in Section D.1. âˆ

Lemma 13.

Under the condition that (195), (196), (197) and (198) hold uniformly for all iğ‘–i and ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W}, if Ti=T0+M/nisubscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡0ğ‘€subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–T_{i}=T_{0}+M/\sqrt{n_{i}}, with Mâ‰¥2â€‹Rğ‘€2ğ‘…M\geq 2R, in which Rğ‘…R is defined in (155), and

T0â‰¥2â€‹rÎ¼1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµ+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’2â€‹Ïµâ€‹mN,subscriptğ‘‡02subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡12italic-Ïµitalic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…12italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘\displaystyle T_{0}\geq\frac{2r_{\mu}}{1-2\epsilon}+\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-2\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}, (199)

then for all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹(T0+2â€‹rÎ¼)+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹mN.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡02subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…1italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}(T_{0}+2r_{\mu})+\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}. (200)
Proof.

The proof is shown in Section D.2. âˆ

Lemma 14.

Under the same conditions as Lemma 13, for all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Î”0+Î”Î¼,delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptÎ”0subscriptÎ”ğœ‡\displaystyle\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\Delta_{0}+\Delta_{\mu}, (201)

in which Î”0subscriptÎ”0\Delta_{0}, Î”Î¼subscriptÎ”ğœ‡\Delta_{\mu} are defined in (95) and (188), respectively.

Define

Î”C=Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹(T0+2â€‹rÎ¼)+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹mN+Î”0+Î”Î¼.subscriptÎ”ğ¶italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡02subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…1italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘subscriptÎ”0subscriptÎ”ğœ‡\displaystyle\Delta_{C}=\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}(T_{0}+2r_{\mu})+\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}+\Delta_{0}+\Delta_{\mu}. (202)

Then for all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Î”C.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptÎ”ğ¶\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\Delta_{C}. (203)

Theorem 2 can then be proved using Lemma 1, 2 and 3 with Î”=Î”CÎ”subscriptÎ”ğ¶\Delta=\Delta_{C}.

D.1 Proof of Lemma 12

Similar to Lemma 9, (1) in Lemma 12 holds, i.e. (195) holds for all iğ‘–i and ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W}. Now prove (2)-(4) separately.

Proof of (2) in Lemma 12. For any ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

ğ”¼â€‹[eÎ»â€‹ğ¯Tâ€‹(ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°))|Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)]=ğ”¼â€‹[expâ¡[1nâ€‹Î»â€‹ğ¯Tâ€‹âˆ‘j=1ni(âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ°,ğ™iâ€‹j)âˆ’Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°))]|Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)].ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptğ‘’ğœ†superscriptğ¯ğ‘‡subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°ğ”¼delimited-[]conditional1ğ‘›ğœ†superscriptğ¯ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–âˆ‡ğ‘“ğ°subscriptğ™ğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[e^{\lambda\mathbf{v}^{T}(\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w}))}|\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right]=\mathbb{E}\left[\exp\left[\frac{1}{n}\lambda\mathbf{v}^{T}\sum_{j=1}^{n_{i}}(\nabla f(\mathbf{w},\mathbf{Z}_{ij})-\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w}))\right]|\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right]. (204)

Hence

ğ”¼â€‹[expâ¡[Î»â€‹ğ¯Tâ€‹(1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°))]|Î¼1â€‹(ğ°),â€¦,Î¼mâ€‹(ğ°)]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalğœ†superscriptğ¯ğ‘‡1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğœ‡1ğ°â€¦subscriptğœ‡ğ‘šğ°\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\exp\left[\lambda\mathbf{v}^{T}\left(\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right)\right]|\mu_{1}(\mathbf{w}),\ldots,\mu_{m}(\mathbf{w})\right] (205)
=\displaystyle= ğ”¼â€‹[expâ¡[1Nâ€‹Î»â€‹ğ¯Tâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mâˆ‘j=1ni(âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ°,ğ™iâ€‹j)âˆ’Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°))]|Î¼1â€‹(ğ°),â€¦,Î¼mâ€‹(ğ°)]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditional1ğ‘ğœ†superscriptğ¯ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘—1subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–âˆ‡ğ‘“ğ°subscriptğ™ğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğœ‡1ğ°â€¦subscriptğœ‡ğ‘šğ°\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\exp\left[\frac{1}{N}\lambda\mathbf{v}^{T}\sum_{i=1}^{m}\sum_{j=1}^{n_{i}}(\nabla f(\mathbf{w},\mathbf{Z}_{ij})-\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w}))\right]|\mu_{1}(\mathbf{w}),\ldots,\mu_{m}(\mathbf{w})\right]
=\displaystyle= Î i=1mâ€‹Î j=1niâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[expâ¡[1Nâ€‹Î»â€‹ğ¯Tâ€‹(âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ°,ğ™iâ€‹j)âˆ’Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°))]|Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)]superscriptsubscriptÎ ğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptÎ ğ‘—1subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–ğ”¼delimited-[]conditional1ğ‘ğœ†superscriptğ¯ğ‘‡âˆ‡ğ‘“ğ°subscriptğ™ğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\Pi_{i=1}^{m}\Pi_{j=1}^{n_{i}}\mathbb{E}\left[\exp\left[\frac{1}{N}\lambda\mathbf{v}^{T}(\nabla f(\mathbf{w},\mathbf{Z}_{ij})-\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w}))\right]|\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right]
=\displaystyle= Î i=1mâ€‹Î j=1niâ€‹e12â€‹N2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Î»2â€‹Â ifÂ â€‹|Î»|â‰¤NÏƒsuperscriptsubscriptÎ ğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptÎ ğ‘—1subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–superscriptğ‘’12superscriptğ‘2superscriptğœ2superscriptğœ†2Â ifÂ ğœ†ğ‘ğœ\displaystyle\Pi_{i=1}^{m}\Pi_{j=1}^{n_{i}}e^{\frac{1}{2N^{2}}\sigma^{2}\lambda^{2}}\text{ if }|\lambda|\leq\frac{N}{\sigma}
=\displaystyle= e12â€‹Nâ€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Î»2â€‹Â ifÂ â€‹|Î»|â‰¤NÏƒ.superscriptğ‘’12ğ‘superscriptğœ2superscriptğœ†2Â ifÂ ğœ†ğ‘ğœ\displaystyle e^{\frac{1}{2N}\sigma^{2}\lambda^{2}}\text{ if }|\lambda|\leq\frac{N}{\sigma}.

Therefore, by Chernoff bound,

Pâ€‹(ğ¯Tâ€‹(1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°))>u)Psuperscriptğ¯ğ‘‡1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°ğ‘¢\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\mathbf{v}^{T}\left(\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right)>u\right) â‰¤\displaystyle\leq inf0â‰¤Î»â‰¤N/Ïƒâ€‹eâˆ’Î»â€‹uâ€‹e12â€‹Nâ€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Î»20ğœ†ğ‘ğœinfimumsuperscriptğ‘’ğœ†ğ‘¢superscriptğ‘’12ğ‘superscriptğœ2superscriptğœ†2\displaystyle\underset{0\leq\lambda\leq N/\sigma}{\inf}e^{-\lambda u}e^{\frac{1}{2N}\sigma^{2}\lambda^{2}} (206)
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq eâˆ’N2â€‹minâ¡{u2Ïƒ2,uÏƒ}.superscriptğ‘’ğ‘2superscriptğ‘¢2superscriptğœ2ğ‘¢ğœ\displaystyle e^{-\frac{N}{2}\min\left\{\frac{u^{2}}{\sigma^{2}},\frac{u}{\sigma}\right\}}.

Similar to (119),

Pâ€‹(âˆ¥1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥>u)â‰¤6dâ€‹eâˆ’N2â€‹minâ¡{u24â€‹Ïƒ2,u2â€‹Ïƒ}.Pdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°ğ‘¢superscript6ğ‘‘superscriptğ‘’ğ‘2superscriptğ‘¢24superscriptğœ2ğ‘¢2ğœ\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\left\lVert\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert>u\right)\leq 6^{d}e^{-\frac{N}{2}\min\left\{\frac{u^{2}}{4\sigma^{2}},\frac{u}{2\sigma}\right\}}. (207)

According to (95),

Pâ€‹(âˆƒkâˆˆ[Ncâ€‹(l)],âˆ¥1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥>Î”0âˆ’2N)â‰¤Î´2.Pformulae-sequenceğ‘˜delimited-[]subscriptğ‘ğ‘ğ‘™delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ†ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜subscriptÎ”02ğ‘ğ›¿2\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\exists k\in[N_{c}(l)],\left\lVert\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert>\Delta_{0}-\frac{2}{N}\right)\leq\frac{\delta}{2}. (208)

Following steps similar to (122), the corresponding bound for all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W} is

Pâ€‹(âˆƒğ°âˆˆğ’²,âˆ¥1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥>Î”0âˆ’2N)â‰¤Î´2.Pformulae-sequenceğ°ğ’²delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°subscriptÎ”02ğ‘ğ›¿2\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\exists\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},\left\lVert\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert>\Delta_{0}-\frac{2}{N}\right)\leq\frac{\delta}{2}. (209)

The proof of (2) in Lemma 12 is complete.

Proof of (3) in Lemma 12. Since Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w}) is sub-exponential around âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\nabla F(\mathbf{w}) with parameter ÏƒÎ¼subscriptğœğœ‡\sigma_{\mu}, using similar steps as the proof of (2) in Lemma 12, it can be shown that

Pâ€‹(âˆ¥Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥>u)â‰¤6dâ€‹eâˆ’12â€‹minâ¡{u24â€‹ÏƒÎ¼2,u2â€‹ÏƒÎ¼}.Pdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘¢superscript6ğ‘‘superscriptğ‘’12superscriptğ‘¢24superscriptsubscriptğœğœ‡2ğ‘¢2subscriptğœğœ‡\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\left\lVert\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert>u\right)\leq 6^{d}e^{-\frac{1}{2}\min\left\{\frac{u^{2}}{4\sigma_{\mu}^{2}},\frac{u}{2\sigma_{\mu}}\right\}}. (210)

Therefore,

Pâ€‹(âˆƒiâˆˆ[m],âˆƒkâˆˆ[Ncâ€‹(l)],âˆ¥Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥>u)â‰¤6dâ€‹mâ€‹CWâ€‹(Nâ€‹L)dâ€‹eâˆ’12â€‹minâ¡{u24â€‹ÏƒÎ¼2,u2â€‹ÏƒÎ¼}.Pformulae-sequenceğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šformulae-sequenceğ‘˜delimited-[]subscriptğ‘ğ‘ğ‘™delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘¢superscript6ğ‘‘ğ‘šsubscriptğ¶ğ‘Šsuperscriptğ‘ğ¿ğ‘‘superscriptğ‘’12superscriptğ‘¢24superscriptsubscriptğœğœ‡2ğ‘¢2subscriptğœğœ‡\displaystyle\text{P}(\exists i\in[m],\exists k\in[N_{c}(l)],\left\lVert\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert>u)\leq 6^{d}mC_{W}(NL)^{d}e^{-\frac{1}{2}\min\left\{\frac{u^{2}}{4\sigma_{\mu}^{2}},\frac{u}{2\sigma_{\mu}}\right\}}. (211)

From the definition of rÎ¼subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡r_{\mu} in (187),

Pâ€‹(âˆƒiâˆˆ[m],âˆƒkâˆˆ[Ncâ€‹(l)],âˆ¥Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°k)âˆ¥>rÎ¼)â‰¤Î´2.Pformulae-sequenceğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šformulae-sequenceğ‘˜delimited-[]subscriptğ‘ğ‘ğ‘™delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–superscriptğ°ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ¹superscriptğ°ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡ğ›¿2\displaystyle\text{P}(\exists i\in[m],\exists k\in[N_{c}(l)],\left\lVert\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w}^{k})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}^{k})\right\rVert>r_{\mu})\leq\frac{\delta}{2}. (212)

The corresponding bound for all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W} is

Pâ€‹(âˆƒiâˆˆ[m],âˆƒğ°âˆˆğ’²,âˆ¥Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥>rÎ¼)â‰¤Î´2.Pformulae-sequenceğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šformulae-sequenceğ°ğ’²delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡ğ›¿2\displaystyle\text{P}(\exists i\in[m],\exists\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},\left\lVert\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert>r_{\mu})\leq\frac{\delta}{2}. (213)

Proof of (4) in Lemma 12. For any ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

ğ”¼â€‹[expâ¡[Î»â€‹ğ¯Tâ€‹(1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹(Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)))]]ğ”¼delimited-[]ğœ†superscriptğ¯ğ‘‡1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\exp\left[\lambda\mathbf{v}^{T}\left(\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}(\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))\right)\right]\right] (214)
=\displaystyle= Î i=1mâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[expâ¡(Î»Nâ€‹ğ¯Tâ€‹niâ€‹(Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)))]superscriptsubscriptÎ ğ‘–1ğ‘šğ”¼delimited-[]ğœ†ğ‘superscriptğ¯ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\displaystyle\Pi_{i=1}^{m}\mathbb{E}\left[\exp\left(\frac{\lambda}{N}\mathbf{v}^{T}n_{i}(\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))\right)\right]
â‰¤(a)ğ‘\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\leq} Î i=1mâ€‹e12â€‹ÏƒÎ¼2â€‹Î»2â€‹ni2N2â€‹Â ifÂ â€‹|Î»|â‰¤Nnmaxâ€‹ÏƒÎ¼superscriptsubscriptÎ ğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptğ‘’12superscriptsubscriptğœğœ‡2superscriptğœ†2superscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2superscriptğ‘2Â ifÂ ğœ†ğ‘subscriptğ‘›subscriptğœğœ‡\displaystyle\Pi_{i=1}^{m}e^{\frac{1}{2}\sigma_{\mu}^{2}\lambda^{2}\frac{n_{i}^{2}}{N^{2}}}\text{ if }|\lambda|\leq\frac{N}{n_{\max}\sigma_{\mu}}
=\displaystyle= eÏƒÎ¼2â€‹Î»22â€‹N2â€‹âˆ‘i=1mni2â€‹Â ifÂ â€‹|Î»|â‰¤Nnmaxâ€‹ÏƒÎ¼.superscriptğ‘’superscriptsubscriptğœğœ‡2superscriptğœ†22superscriptğ‘2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2Â ifÂ ğœ†ğ‘subscriptğ‘›subscriptğœğœ‡\displaystyle e^{\frac{\sigma_{\mu}^{2}\lambda^{2}}{2N^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}^{2}}\text{ if }|\lambda|\leq\frac{N}{n_{\max}\sigma_{\mu}}.

For (a), note that

ğ”¼â€‹[expâ¡(Î»Nâ€‹ğ¯Tâ€‹niâ€‹(Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)))]â‰¤e12â€‹ÏƒÎ¼2â€‹Î»2â€‹ni2N2,Â ifÂ â€‹|Î»|â‰¤Nniâ€‹ÏƒÎ¼.formulae-sequenceğ”¼delimited-[]ğœ†ğ‘superscriptğ¯ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°superscriptğ‘’12superscriptsubscriptğœğœ‡2superscriptğœ†2superscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2superscriptğ‘2Â ifÂ ğœ†ğ‘subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœğœ‡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\exp\left(\frac{\lambda}{N}\mathbf{v}^{T}n_{i}(\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))\right)\right]\leq e^{\frac{1}{2}\sigma_{\mu}^{2}\lambda^{2}\frac{n_{i}^{2}}{N^{2}}},\text{ if }|\lambda|\leq\frac{N}{n_{i}\sigma_{\mu}}. (215)

With |Î»|â‰¤N/nmaxğœ†ğ‘subscriptğ‘›|\lambda|\leq N/n_{\max}, the above bounds hold for all iğ‘–i.

Therefore

Pâ€‹(ğ¯Tâ€‹(1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹(Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)))>u)â‰¤inf0â‰¤Î»â‰¤N/(nmaxâ€‹ÏƒÎ¼)â€‹eâˆ’Î»â€‹uâ€‹eÏƒÎ¼2â€‹Î»22â€‹N2â€‹âˆ‘i=1mni2Psuperscriptğ¯ğ‘‡1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘¢0ğœ†ğ‘subscriptğ‘›subscriptğœğœ‡infimumsuperscriptğ‘’ğœ†ğ‘¢superscriptğ‘’superscriptsubscriptğœğœ‡2superscriptğœ†22superscriptğ‘2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\mathbf{v}^{T}\left(\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}(\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))\right)>u\right)\leq\underset{0\leq\lambda\leq N/(n_{\max}\sigma_{\mu})}{\inf}e^{-\lambda u}e^{\frac{\sigma_{\mu}^{2}\lambda^{2}}{2N^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}^{2}} (216)

If uâ‰¤(ÏƒÎ¼â€‹âˆ‘i=1mni2)/(Nâ€‹nmax)ğ‘¢subscriptğœğœ‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2ğ‘subscriptğ‘›u\leq(\sigma_{\mu}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}^{2})/(Nn_{\max}), then (216) reaches maximum with Î»=N2â€‹u/(ÏƒÎ¼2â€‹âˆ‘i=1mni2)â‰¤N/(nmaxâ€‹ÏƒÎ¼)ğœ†superscriptğ‘2ğ‘¢superscriptsubscriptğœğœ‡2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2ğ‘subscriptğ‘›subscriptğœğœ‡\lambda=N^{2}u/(\sigma_{\mu}^{2}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}^{2})\leq N/(n_{\max}\sigma_{\mu}). Then

Pâ€‹(ğ¯Tâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹(Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°))>u)â‰¤expâ¡(âˆ’N2â€‹u22â€‹ÏƒÎ¼2â€‹âˆ‘i=1mni2).Psuperscriptğ¯ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘¢superscriptğ‘2superscriptğ‘¢22superscriptsubscriptğœğœ‡2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\mathbf{v}^{T}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}(\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))>u\right)\leq\exp\left(-\frac{N^{2}u^{2}}{2\sigma_{\mu}^{2}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}^{2}}\right). (217)

If u>(ÏƒÎ¼â€‹âˆ‘i=1mni2)/(Nâ€‹nmax)ğ‘¢subscriptğœğœ‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2ğ‘subscriptğ‘›u>(\sigma_{\mu}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}^{2})/(Nn_{\max}), then (216) reaches maximum with Î»=N/(nmaxâ€‹ÏƒÎ¼)ğœ†ğ‘subscriptğ‘›subscriptğœğœ‡\lambda=N/(n_{\max}\sigma_{\mu}). Then

Pâ€‹(ğ¯Tâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹(Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°))>u)Psuperscriptğ¯ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘¢\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\mathbf{v}^{T}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}(\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))>u\right) â‰¤(a)ğ‘\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\leq} expâ¡[âˆ’Nâ€‹unmaxâ€‹ÏƒÎ¼+12â€‹nmax2â€‹âˆ‘i=1mni2]ğ‘ğ‘¢subscriptğ‘›subscriptğœğœ‡12superscriptsubscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2\displaystyle\exp\left[-\frac{Nu}{n_{\max}\sigma_{\mu}}+\frac{1}{2n_{\max}^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}^{2}\right] (218)
â‰¤(b)ğ‘\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{\leq} expâ¡[âˆ’Nâ€‹unmaxâ€‹ÏƒÎ¼+Nâ€‹u2â€‹nmaxâ€‹ÏƒÎ¼]ğ‘ğ‘¢subscriptğ‘›subscriptğœğœ‡ğ‘ğ‘¢2subscriptğ‘›subscriptğœğœ‡\displaystyle\exp\left[-\frac{Nu}{n_{\max}\sigma_{\mu}}+\frac{Nu}{2n_{\max}\sigma_{\mu}}\right]
=\displaystyle= expâ¡[âˆ’Nâ€‹u2â€‹nmaxâ€‹ÏƒÎ¼],ğ‘ğ‘¢2subscriptğ‘›subscriptğœğœ‡\displaystyle\exp\left[-\frac{Nu}{2n_{\max}\sigma_{\mu}}\right],

in which (a) uses (216), (b) uses the condition u>(ÏƒÎ¼â€‹âˆ‘i=1mni2)/(Nâ€‹nmax)ğ‘¢subscriptğœğœ‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2ğ‘subscriptğ‘›u>(\sigma_{\mu}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}^{2})/(Nn_{\max}), which yields

âˆ‘i=1mni2nmax<Nâ€‹uÏƒÎ¼.superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘›ğ‘ğ‘¢subscriptğœğœ‡\displaystyle\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}^{2}}{n_{\max}}<\frac{Nu}{\sigma_{\mu}}. (219)

Hence (b) holds. From (217) and (218),

Pâ€‹(ğ¯Tâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹(Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°))>u)â‰¤expâ¡[âˆ’minâ¡{N2â€‹u22â€‹ÏƒÎ¼2â€‹âˆ‘i=1mni2,Nâ€‹u2â€‹nmaxâ€‹ÏƒÎ¼}].Psuperscriptğ¯ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘¢superscriptğ‘2superscriptğ‘¢22superscriptsubscriptğœğœ‡2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2ğ‘ğ‘¢2subscriptğ‘›subscriptğœğœ‡\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\mathbf{v}^{T}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}(\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))>u\right)\leq\exp\left[-\min\left\{\frac{N^{2}u^{2}}{2\sigma_{\mu}^{2}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}^{2}},\frac{Nu}{2n_{\max}\sigma_{\mu}}\right\}\right]. (220)

Similar to (119),

Pâ€‹(âˆ¥âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹(Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°))âˆ¥>u)â‰¤6dâ€‹expâ¡[âˆ’minâ¡{N2â€‹u28â€‹ÏƒÎ¼2â€‹âˆ‘i=1mni2,Nâ€‹u4â€‹nmaxâ€‹ÏƒÎ¼}].Pdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°ğ‘¢superscript6ğ‘‘superscriptğ‘2superscriptğ‘¢28superscriptsubscriptğœğœ‡2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2ğ‘ğ‘¢4subscriptğ‘›subscriptğœğœ‡\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\left\lVert\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}(\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))\right\rVert>u\right)\leq 6^{d}\exp\left[-\min\left\{\frac{N^{2}u^{2}}{8\sigma_{\mu}^{2}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}^{2}},\frac{Nu}{4n_{\max}\sigma_{\mu}}\right\}\right]. (221)

Recall the definition of Î”Î¼subscriptÎ”ğœ‡\Delta_{\mu} in (188), for all ğ°âˆˆğ’²ğ°ğ’²\mathbf{w}\in\mathcal{W},

Pâ€‹(âˆ¥âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹(Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°))âˆ¥>Î”Î¼)â‰¤Î´2.Pdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°subscriptÎ”ğœ‡ğ›¿2\displaystyle\text{P}\left(\left\lVert\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}(\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w}))\right\rVert>\Delta_{\mu}\right)\leq\frac{\delta}{2}. (222)

Now we have proved that all four conditions in Lemma 12 are violated with probability no more than Î´/2ğ›¿2\delta/2. Hence, with probability 1âˆ’2â€‹Î´12ğ›¿1-2\delta, all these four conditions hold. The proof is complete.

D.2 Proof of Lemma 13

Now (175) still holds, i.e.

âˆ‡shâ€‹(gâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)=0.subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘”ğ°ğ°0\displaystyle\nabla_{s}h(g(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})=0. (223)

(176) becomes

âˆ¥âˆ‡shâ€‹(aâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ€‹(Ti+2â€‹r0â€‹i+2â€‹rÎ¼).delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘ğ°ğ°subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡\displaystyle\left\lVert\nabla_{s}h(a(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}n_{i}(T_{i}+2r_{0i}+2r_{\mu}). (224)

Note that (139) still holds. Now define rs=T0âˆ’2â€‹rÎ¼subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ subscriptğ‘‡02subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡r_{s}=T_{0}-2r_{\mu}. For all ğ¬âˆˆBâ€‹(aâ€‹(ğ°),rs)ğ¬ğµğ‘ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ \mathbf{s}\in B(a(\mathbf{w}),r_{s}), iâˆ‰â„¬ğ‘–â„¬i\notin\mathcal{B}, we have

âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ—iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ—ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{X}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert =\displaystyle= âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert (225)
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ¥ğ¬âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥+âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ¬ğ‘ğ°delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{s}-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert+\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq rs+2â€‹r0â€‹i+2â€‹rÎ¼subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ 2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡\displaystyle r_{s}+2r_{0i}+2r_{\mu}
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq T0+2â€‹Rnisubscriptğ‘‡02ğ‘…subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–\displaystyle T_{0}+\frac{2R}{\sqrt{n_{i}}}
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq T0+2â€‹Rnisubscriptğ‘‡02ğ‘…subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–\displaystyle T_{0}+\frac{2R}{\sqrt{n_{i}}}
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq T.ğ‘‡\displaystyle T.

The last step comes from the statements in Lemma 13 that Ti=T0+M/nisubscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡0ğ‘€subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–T_{i}=T_{0}+M/\sqrt{n_{i}} and Mâ‰¥2â€‹Rğ‘€2ğ‘…M\geq 2R. Therefore, for sâˆˆBâ€‹(aâ€‹(ğ°),rs)ğ‘ ğµğ‘ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ s\in B(a(\mathbf{w}),r_{s}),

âˆ‡s2hâ€‹(ğ¬,ğ°)âª°Nâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹ğˆ.succeeds-or-equalssuperscriptsubscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ 2â„ğ¬ğ°ğ‘1italic-Ïµğˆ\displaystyle\nabla_{s}^{2}h(\mathbf{s},\mathbf{w})\succeq N(1-\epsilon)\mathbf{I}. (226)

Note that

âˆ¥âˆ‡shâ€‹(aâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘ğ°ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\nabla_{s}h(a(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})\right\rVert =\displaystyle= âˆ¥âˆ‡shâ€‹(aâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡shâ€‹(gâ€‹(ğ°),ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘ğ°ğ°subscriptâˆ‡ğ‘ â„ğ‘”ğ°ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\nabla_{s}h(a(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})-\nabla_{s}h(g(\mathbf{w}),\mathbf{w})\right\rVert (227)
â‰¥\displaystyle\geq Nâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹minâ¡{âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥,rs}.ğ‘1italic-Ïµdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ \displaystyle N(1-\epsilon)\min\{\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert,r_{s}\}.

Therefore

minâ¡{âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥,rs}delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ \displaystyle\min\left\{\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert,r_{s}\right\} â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ€‹(Ti+2â€‹r0â€‹i+2â€‹rÎ¼)Nâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ)subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘Ÿ0ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡ğ‘1italic-Ïµ\displaystyle\frac{\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}n_{i}(T_{i}+2r_{0i}+2r_{\mu})}{N(1-\epsilon)} (228)
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ‘iâˆˆâ„¬niâ€‹(T0+M+2â€‹Rni+2â€‹rÎ¼)Nâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ)subscriptğ‘–â„¬subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ‘‡0ğ‘€2ğ‘…subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡ğ‘1italic-Ïµ\displaystyle\frac{\sum_{i\in\mathcal{B}}n_{i}\left(T_{0}+\frac{M+2R}{\sqrt{n_{i}}}+2r_{\mu}\right)}{N(1-\epsilon)}
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq (T0+2â€‹rÎ¼)â€‹Ïµâ€‹N+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)â€‹mâ€‹NNâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ)subscriptğ‘‡02subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡italic-Ïµğ‘italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…ğ‘šğ‘ğ‘1italic-Ïµ\displaystyle\frac{(T_{0}+2r_{\mu})\epsilon N+\epsilon(M+2R)\sqrt{mN}}{N(1-\epsilon)}
=\displaystyle= Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹(T0+2â€‹rÎ¼)+Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)â€‹mN.italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡02subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…ğ‘šğ‘\displaystyle\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}(T_{0}+2r_{\mu})+\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}(M+2R)\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}.

Note that from (199),

Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹(T0+2â€‹rÎ¼)+Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)â€‹mNâ‰¤rs.italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡02subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…ğ‘šğ‘subscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘ \displaystyle\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}(T_{0}+2r_{\mu})+\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}(M+2R)\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}\leq r_{s}. (229)

Therefore

âˆ¥gâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥â‰¤Ïµ1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹(T0+2â€‹rÎ¼)+Ïµâ€‹(M+2â€‹R)1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹mN.delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘”ğ°ğ‘ğ°italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsubscriptğ‘‡02subscriptğ‘Ÿğœ‡italic-Ïµğ‘€2ğ‘…1italic-Ïµğ‘šğ‘\displaystyle\left\lVert g(\mathbf{w})-a(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert\leq\frac{\epsilon}{1-\epsilon}(T_{0}+2r_{\mu})+\frac{\epsilon(M+2R)}{1-\epsilon}\sqrt{\frac{m}{N}}. (230)

D.3 Proof of Lemma 14

âˆ¥aâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert a(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ¥1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert (231)
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq âˆ¥1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹ğ†iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥+âˆ¥1Nâ€‹âˆ‘i=1mniâ€‹Î¼iâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ’âˆ‡Fâ€‹(ğ°)âˆ¥delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğ†ğ‘–ğ°1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°delimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘›ğ‘–subscriptğœ‡ğ‘–ğ°âˆ‡ğ¹ğ°\displaystyle\left\lVert\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mathbf{G}_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert+\left\lVert\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{i}\mu_{i}(\mathbf{w})-\nabla F(\mathbf{w})\right\rVert
â‰¤\displaystyle\leq Î”0+Î”Î¼.subscriptÎ”0subscriptÎ”ğœ‡\displaystyle\Delta_{0}+\Delta_{\mu}.
